Package org.katpara.mathematica.linears.matrices

Interface Matrix

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrayMatrix
    public interface Matrix
    The interface defines a Matrix in the system, and it's operations. Mathematically A matrixOld is an rectangular object of numbers, which has rows and columns.

    The mathematical application of a matrixOld is to perform a learning transformation of a space. It can scale up or down, turn and twist the space. That can lead to deformation of vectors as well.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Mehul Katpara

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  Matrix.MatrixType
      The type of matrixOld created by the sytem.
      static class  Matrix.PascalMatrixType
      The Enum is used to create a type of pascal matrixOld.
      static class  Matrix.ShiftMatrixType
      The enum is used to create a type of shift matrixOld.

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      double determinant()
      A determinant is a scalar value computed for a square matrixOld; that encodes many properties of the linear algebra described by the matrixOld.
      static ArrayMatrix exchangeArrayMatrix​(int n)
      An exchange matrixOld is a square matrixOld whose counterdiagonal is always 1 and the rest of the elements are 0.
      int[] getDimension()
      The method returns the dimension of a matrixOld.
      Matrix.MatrixType getType()
      The method returns the type of a matrixOld.
      static ArrayMatrix hilbertArrayMatrix​(int n)
      A Hilbert matrixOld is a square matrixOld with entries being the unit fractions.
      static ArrayMatrix identityArrayMatrix​(int n)
      The identity matrixOld is a square matrixOld whose diagonal is always 1 and all the other elements are 0.
      boolean isColumnVector()
      The method will return true if the matrixOld is a column vector, which is n x 1.
      boolean isRowVector()
      The method will return true if the matrixOld is a row vector, which is 1 x n
      boolean isSquareMatrix()
      The method will return true if the matrixOld is a square matrixOld, which is n x n.

      A lehmer matrixOld is a constant systematic square matrixOld.
      static ArrayMatrix oneArrayMatrix​(int m, int n)
      In mathematics, a matrixOld of one, or all-ones matrixOld is a matrixOld whose all elements are 1.
      static ArrayMatrix pascalArrayMatrix​(int n, Matrix.PascalMatrixType t)
      The method will return a zero or null matrixOld, whose all the elements are zero.
      int rank()
      A rank of a matrixOld is independent rows of a matrixOld.
      static ArrayMatrix redhefferArrayMatrix​(int n)
      A redheffer matrixOld is a (0-1) square matrixOld, whose entries are either 1 or 0.
      static ArrayMatrix shiftArrayMatrix​(int n, Matrix.ShiftMatrixType t)
      The shift matrixOld is a matrixOld whose diagonal has shifted one level up or down, known as super diagonal matrixOld, or lower diagonal matrixOld.

      The method returns all the elements of a matrixOld.

      The method returns the list of Vectors.

      The trace of the matrixOld is defined as the sum of all the elements, on the main diagonal.

      The method will return a zero or null matrixOld, whose all the elements are zero.

        int[] getDimension()
        The method returns the dimension of a matrixOld.
        Returns:
        the dimension of the matrixOld

        Matrix.MatrixType getType()
        The method returns the type of a matrixOld. For more details see Matrix.MatrixType
        Returns:
        the type of matrixOld

        java.lang.Number[][] toArray()
        The method returns all the elements of a matrixOld.

        The method returns the list of Vectors.

        the matrixOld elements as a list of vectors

      • isRowVector

        boolean isRowVector()
        The method will return true if the matrixOld is a row vector, which is 1 x n
        Returns:
        true if it is a row vector

      • isColumnVector

        boolean isColumnVector()
        The method will return true if the matrixOld is a column vector, which is n x 1.
        Returns:
        true if it is a column vector

      • isSquareMatrix

        boolean isSquareMatrix()
        The method will return true if the matrixOld is a square matrixOld, which is n x n.
        Returns:
        true if it is a square matrixOld

      • trace

        double trace()
        The trace of the matrixOld is defined as the sum of all the elements, on the main diagonal.

        The trace only exist for a square matrixOld.

        Returns:
        the trace of the square matrixOld

      • rank

        int rank()
        A rank of a matrixOld is independent rows of a matrixOld. That shows that how many rows of a matrixOld are totally independent, or co-dependent on other rows.
        Returns:
        the rank of matrixOld

      • determinant

        double determinant()
        A determinant is a scalar value computed for a square matrixOld; that encodes many properties of the linear algebra described by the matrixOld. It is denoted as det(A), where A is a matrixOld or |A|.
        Returns:
        the determinant of the square matrixOld

      • zeroArrayMatrix

        static ArrayMatrix zeroArrayMatrix​(int m,
                                   int n)
        The method will return a zero or null matrixOld, whose all the elements are zero.
        Parameters:
        m - the number of rows
        n - the number of columns
        Returns:
        a Matrix with all 0 entries
        Throws:
        InvalidMatrixDimensionException - when # of row + # of column < 2; this ensures that at least one element exist all the time.

      • oneArrayMatrix

        static ArrayMatrix oneArrayMatrix​(int m,
                                  int n)
        In mathematics, a matrixOld of one, or all-ones matrixOld is a matrixOld whose all elements are 1.
        Parameters:
        m - the number of rows
        n - the number of columns
        Returns:
        a one matrixOld
        Throws:
        InvalidMatrixDimensionException - when m + n < 2

      • pascalArrayMatrix

        static ArrayMatrix pascalArrayMatrix​(int n,
                                     Matrix.PascalMatrixType t)
        The method will return a zero or null matrixOld, whose all the elements are zero.
        Parameters:
        n - the number of rows and columns
        t - the type of matrixOld; LOWER - Lover triangular UPPER - Upper triangular SYMMETRIC - a symmetric matrixOld
        Returns:
        a Pascal's Matrix
        Throws:
        InvalidMatrixDimensionException - when n < 1, at least one element should exist.

      • lehmerArrayMatrix

        static ArrayMatrix lehmerArrayMatrix​(int n)
        A lehmer matrixOld is a constant systematic square matrixOld.
        Parameters:
        n - the number of rows and columns
        Returns:
        the lehmer ArrayMatrix

      • identityArrayMatrix

        static ArrayMatrix identityArrayMatrix​(int n)
        The identity matrixOld is a square matrixOld whose diagonal is always 1 and all the other elements are 0.
        Parameters:
        n - the number of rows and columns
        Returns:
        an identity ArrayMatrix
        Throws:
        InvalidMatrixDimensionException - if n < 1

      • hilbertArrayMatrix

        static ArrayMatrix hilbertArrayMatrix​(int n)
        A Hilbert matrixOld is a square matrixOld with entries being the unit fractions.
        Parameters:
        n - the number of rows and columns
        Returns:
        a hilbert ArrayMatrix
        Throws:
        InvalidMatrixDimensionException - if n < 1

      • exchangeArrayMatrix

        static ArrayMatrix exchangeArrayMatrix​(int n)
        An exchange matrixOld is a square matrixOld whose counterdiagonal is always 1 and the rest of the elements are 0.
        Parameters:
        n - the square matrixOld
        Returns:
        an exchange ArrayMatrix
        Throws:
        InvalidMatrixDimensionException - if n < 1

      • redhefferArrayMatrix

        static ArrayMatrix redhefferArrayMatrix​(int n)
        A redheffer matrixOld is a (0-1) square matrixOld, whose entries are either 1 or 0. The matrixOld is calculated as if n is divisible by m, then it's 1 otherwise it's 0.
        Parameters:
        n - the number of rows and columns
        Returns:
        a redheffer ArrayMatrix
        Throws:
        InvalidMatrixDimensionException - if n < 1

      • shiftArrayMatrix

        static ArrayMatrix shiftArrayMatrix​(int n,
                                    Matrix.ShiftMatrixType t)
        The shift matrixOld is a matrixOld whose diagonal has shifted one level up or down, known as super diagonal matrixOld, or lower diagonal matrixOld.
        Parameters:
        n - the number of rows and columns
        t - the type of matrixOld, i.e UPPER or LOWER
        Returns:
        a shift ArrayMatrix
        Throws:
        InvalidMatrixDimensionException - if n < 1
